replyMessages.groupOnly: ❌ This command can only be used in groups.
replyMessages.privateOnly: ❌ This command can only be used in private chat.
replyMessages.adminOnly: ❌ This command is only for admins.
replyMessages.ownerOnly: ❌ This command is only for bot owner.
replyMessages.premiumOnly: ❌ This command is only for premium users.
replyMessages.limitReached:
❌ You have reached your daily limit!

📊 Current Status:
├ 🎫 Remaining: {limit} commands
├ 💎 Upgrade to Premium for unlimited usage
├ 🔄 Limit resets daily at 00:00 WIB
└ 📞 Contact owner for premium access

💡 Use .limit to check your usage.
replyMessages.botAdmin: ❌ I need admin privileges to execute this command.
replyMessages.needAdmin: ❌ You need to be a group admin to use this command.
replyMessages.cooldown: ⏰ Please wait {cooldown} seconds before using this command again.
replyMessages.error: ❌ An error occurred while executing the command.
replyMessages.welcome:
👋 Welcome to the group, @{user}!

Please follow the group rules and enjoy your stay! 🎉
replyMessages.goodbye:
👋 Goodbye @{user}!

Thanks for being part of our group! 🙏
